title: "Animal Tea Party"
content:
Welcome to our website, where you can immerse yourself in a whimsical world of tea parties with anthropomorphic animals. Our site is dedicated to bringing you the latest news and trends in the world of animal-themed tea parties, from cute and cuddly to quirky and unique. 

Whether you're a fan of Alice in Wonderland or just love animals, our site has something for everyone. We feature articles on everything from DIY decorations to delicious recipes, as well as tips on how to host the perfect animal tea party.

So come join us for a cup of tea and some furry fun! üê∞üçµ

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A whimsical tea party with anthropomorphic animals"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
